display_html:
data RuleType
  • = Initial
  • | Transition
name: RuleType Initial Transition

display_html:
data SRuleType a where
  • SInitial ∷ SRuleType Initial
  • STransition ∷ SRuleType Transition
name: SRuleType STransition SInitial

display_html:
class RuleTypeRep t where
  • rTypeRep ∷ SRuleType t
name: RuleTypeRep rTypeRep

display_html: newtype IRC sts = IRC (Environment sts)
name: IRC IRC

display_html: newtype TRC sts = TRC (Environment sts, State sts, Signal sts)
name: TRC TRC

display_html: type family RuleContext (t ∷ RuleType) = (ctx ∷ Type → Type) | ctx → t where ...
name: RuleContext

display_html: type InitialRule sts = Rule sts Initial (State sts)
name: InitialRule

display_html: type TransitionRule sts = Rule sts Transition (State sts)
name: TransitionRule

display_html:
class (Eq (PredicateFailure a), Show (PredicateFailure a), Monad (BaseM a)) ⇒ STS a where
  • type State a ∷ ★
  • type Signal a ∷ ★
  • type Environment a ∷ ★
  • type BaseM a ∷ ★ → ★
  • data PredicateFailure a ∷ ★
  • initialRules ∷ [InitialRule a]
  • transitionRules ∷ [TransitionRule a]
name: STS transitionRules initialRules State BaseM PredicateFailure Environment Signal

display_html:
class (STS sub, STS super, BaseM sub ~ BaseM super) ⇒ Embed sub super where
  • wrapFailed ∷ PredicateFailure sub → PredicateFailure super
name: Embed wrapFailed

display_html:
data Clause sts (rtype ∷ RuleType) a where
  • Lift ∷ STS sts ⇒ BaseM sts a → (a → b) → Clause sts rtype b
  • GetCtx ∷ (RuleContext rtype sts → a) → Clause sts rtype a
  • SubTrans ∷ Embed sub sts ⇒ RuleContext rtype sub → (State sub → a) → Clause sts rtype a
  • Predicate ∷ Bool → PredicateFailure sts → a → Clause sts rtype a
name: Clause SubTrans GetCtx Predicate Lift

display_html: type Rule sts rtype = F (Clause sts rtype)
name: Rule

display_html: (?!) ∷ Bool → PredicateFailure sts → Rule sts ctx ()
failBecause ∷ PredicateFailure sts → Rule sts ctx ()
name: failBecause

display_html: trans ∷ Embed sub super ⇒ RuleContext rtype sub → Rule super rtype (State sub)
name: trans

display_html: liftSTS ∷ STS sts ⇒ BaseM sts a → Rule sts ctx a
name: liftSTS

display_html: judgmentContext ∷ Rule sts rtype (RuleContext rtype sts)
name: judgmentContext

display_html: applyRuleIndifferently ∷ ∀ s m rtype. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ RuleContext rtype s → Rule s rtype (State s) → m (State s, [PredicateFailure s])
name: applyRuleIndifferently

display_html: applySTSIndifferently ∷ ∀ s m rtype. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ RuleContext rtype s → m (State s, [[PredicateFailure s]])
name: applySTSIndifferently

display_html: applySTS ∷ ∀ s m rtype. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, m ~ BaseM s) ⇒ RuleContext rtype s → m (Either [[PredicateFailure s]] (State s))
name: applySTS

name: Threshold Threshold

name: applyRuleIndifferently

display_html: applySTSIndifferently ∷ ∀ s rtype. (STS s, RuleTypeRep rtype, Identity ~ BaseM s) ⇒ RuleContext rtype s → (State s, [[PredicateFailure s]])
name: applySTSIndifferently

name: applySTS

name: Threshold Threshold

name: Rule

  • SubTrans ∷ Embed sub sts ⇒ RuleContext rtype sub → (State sub → a) → Clause sts rtype a

display_html: module Control.State.Transition.Simple
(.-) ∷ ∀ m st sig err. (MonadIO m, MonadReader (st → sig → Either err st) m, Show err) ⇒ m st → sig → m st
(.->) ∷ ∀ m st. (MonadIO m, Eq st, Show st) ⇒ m st → st → m st
checkTrace ∷ ∀ s m. (STS s, BaseM s ~ m) ⇒ (∀ a. m a → a) → Environment s → ReaderT (State s → Signal s → Either [[PredicateFailure s]] (State s)) IO (State s) → IO ()
name: checkTrace

display_html:
data Trace s = Trace {
  • _traceEnv ∷ !(Environment s)
  • _traceInitState ∷ !(State s)
  • _traceTrans ∷ !(StrictSeq (SigState s))
}
name: Trace Trace _traceEnv _traceInitState _traceTrans

display_html:
data TraceOrder

  • | OldestFirst
name: TraceOrder NewestFirst OldestFirst

class STS sts ⇒ HasTrace sts traceGenEnv where
  • type BaseEnv sts ∷ Type
  • interpretSTS ∷ ∀ a. BaseEnv sts → BaseM sts a → a
  • envGen ∷ traceGenEnv → Gen (Environment sts)
  • sigGen ∷ traceGenEnv → Environment sts → State sts → Gen (Signal sts)
  • shrinkSignal ∷ Signal sts → [Signal sts]
name: HasTrace BaseEnv envGen sigGen shrinkSignal interpretSTS
